text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly notes that the Belgian officers were acting in accordance with Article 9(5) of the Convention when it states: 'More critically, Article 9(5) provides that when an authorized officer has reason to believe a vessel is not complying with Convention provisions, the officer \"may identify the vessel, seek to obtain the necessary information from the vessel and report.\"' This directly addresses the criterion.", "criterion_id": "criterion 5"}
